documents.document: There’s a special offer on till midnight tonight. Would be great to see a packed Odyssey Arena for what promises to be a unique event with top quality basketball on show. https://t.co/E0JhVMkBXR
@IsaacWestbrooks @NBA @sixers He’s fantastic. Fingers crossed he does. He’s the poster boy for running his mouth on twitter too. You need those characters

@ConorGlee @MalachyClerkin Mines more the practical side of even that. Basketball you go sub in and out but only when the game stops. Ice hockey doesn’t require a stop. If the ref has to stop lots for subs it will be a disaster
@MalachyClerkin Do the substitutions still work in the same way? Or will it be like ice hockey with rolling subs?

Well done to @ShamrockRovers with the #FootballLovesUs videos. So simple and practical.
@EamonnMurphy19 Yeah was poor.
@EamonnMurphy19 Yep. Problem is a flaw in the replay rule that they could only look to see who it hit last and even if it’s a foul they can do nothing
Not being able to look for a foul on that KD LeBron review ruined the end of that Warriors Cavs game. NBA needs to change the rule.

@tnolan05 Just getting started Trish and wanted to leave some for you to get involved. 😉
@DaveDoran88 @PaulTKelleher @johndowling51 @TweetingBird13 @emerology Leah Westbrooks and Susan Doyle

@PaulTKelleher @johndowling51 Lots more Women. @TweetingBird13, Siobhan Kilkenny, @emerology, Karen Hennessy, Emer Foley, Anna Kelly (currently). Might be missing some I’m sure Emer and Sue will add them in.
@PaulTKelleher @johndowling51 Where did Jimmy ward play? Ian OBoyle played for NJIT but I think they actually went d1 after he left.

@WhyNotMeHoops @johndowling51 Guys d1 is only Bree, Grace, Killeen, Cummins, O’Boyle, Carroll, Blount, Sullivan, Cairns, Ward. Not sure about Niall Phelan. Am sure I’ve left someone out. Maybe not all of those had scholarships?
@johndowling51 @PaulTKelleher Fair enough. Anyway it’s not the most important part. Great that there’s currently 3 and will hopefully be more next season.
@johndowling51 @PaulTKelleher Ok so you mean male only d1.
@WhyNotMeHoops I think there’s 6 in d1 schools this year alone.
Great for Cian to get some exposure. Seemed like a lovely guy in Belfast. Definitely not the 8th Irish player to play college basketball though but that’s nitpicking. https://t.co/qhtpkNBtr4
